text: The National Democratic Party was one of two parties that were in Brunei in the 1980s. The other party was the Brunei National United Party. After a few years, both parties were banned. From 1995, the Brunei National United party was allowed again, and other parties were founded. The National Democratic Party was not created again. ==References== Category:Brunei Category:Political parties in Asia
title: National Democratic Party (Brunei)
